summary: This release adds Wander, a first-person mode for exploring groves, and Forests, community spaces inspired by GeoCities neighborhoods. I also migrated payments to Lemon Squeezy and set up Durable Objects for caching and real-time features.

features: add Data Protection section with backup status
implement Durable Objects for caching and real-time features (#311)
add grove-durable-objects worker for Pages compatibility
migrate payment system from Stripe to Lemon Squeezy
add Curios - cabinet of wonders for visitor experience features
add Forests - community aggregation inspired by GeoCities neighborhoods
add Wander - first-person immersive grove discovery
fixes: add type annotation to gallery image map callback
revert ThemeToggle from season indicator to light/dark mode toggle (#319)
update status page link to status.grove.place (#323)
add esbuild dependency for Durable Objects compilation in CI
cast SDK attributes through unknown for TypeScript compatibility
use correct LineSquiggle icon name for Wander drift mode
refactoring: migrate from deprecated svelte:component to Svelte 5 pattern
docs: add repository snapshot and release summary for v0.9.4
add Shutter web content distillation spec
update Aria status to Paused in Beyond roadmap (#322)
add Lemon Squeezy setup and reference guide
update TODOS with Jan 13 session notes and tomorrow's tasks
